odase

Class ABoxReasonerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • odase.ABoxReasonerConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllOwlDlConfig, FastConfig

    public abstract class ABoxReasonerConfig
extends Object
    ABoxReasonerConfig is used to configure which OWL axioms are transformed into SWRL rules.

      ABoxReasonerConfig()

    • Constructor Detail

      • ABoxReasonerConfig

        public ABoxReasonerConfig()

    • Method Detail

      • doVirtualInstance

        public boolean doVirtualInstance()

      • owlFullParsing

        public abstract boolean owlFullParsing()
        Allow OWL-FULL parsing? For example interpret subjects and objects of owl:inverseOf triples as object properties. In OWL-DL the property would need to be explicitly typed.

      • swrlParsing

        public abstract boolean swrlParsing()
        Parse normal swrl rules as well?

      • translateAllValuesFromAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateAllValuesFromAxioms()
        Translate all values from OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        (p allValuesFrom A)(?x) /\ p(?x, ?y) -> A(?y)

      • translateClassHasValueAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateClassHasValueAxioms()
        Translate class has value OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?x, v) -> (p hasValue v)(?x)

      • translateDomainAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateDomainAxioms()
        Translate domain OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?x, ?y) -> D(?x)
        (where D is the domain of p)

      • translateEquivClassesAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateEquivClassesAxioms()
        Translate equivalent classes OWL axioms into the following SWRL rules

        A(?x) -> B(?x)
        B(?x) -> A(?x)

      • translateEquivPropertiesAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateEquivPropertiesAxioms()
        Translate equivalent properties OWL axioms into the following SWRL rules

        p(?x, ?y) -> q(?x, ?y)
        q(?x, ?y) -> p(?x, ?y)

      • translateIntersectionForwardAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateIntersectionForwardAxioms()
        Translate intersection forward OWL axioms into the following SWRL rules

        A(?x) /\ B(?x) -> C(?x)
        (where C = intersectionOf({A, B}))

      • translateIntersectionReverseAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateIntersectionReverseAxioms()
        Translate intersection reverse OWL axioms into the following SWRL rules

        C(?x) -> A(?x)
        (where C = intersectionOf({..., A, ... }))

      • translateInversePropertyAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateInversePropertyAxioms()
        Translate inverse property OWL axioms into the following SWRL rules

        p(?x, ?y) -> inverse_of_p(?y, ?x)
        inverse_of_p(?x, ?y) -> p(?y, ?x)

      • translateMinCardinalityAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateMinCardinalityAxioms(int n)
        Translate min cardinality from OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?x, ?y1) /\ p(?x, ?y2) /\ .. /\ p(?x, ?yN) /\ differentFrom(?y1, ?y2) /\ .. /\ differentFrom(?y1, ?yN) /\ .. /\ differentFrom(?y(N-1), ?yN) -> (p minCardinality N)(?x)
        The int argument is the min cardinality. This allows the translation to be turned on or off depending on the cardinality (you might want to disable the translations for cardinalities higher than a certain limit).

      • translatePropertyHasValueAxioms

        public abstract boolean translatePropertyHasValueAxioms()
        Translate property has value OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        (p hasValue v)(?x) -> p(?x, v)

      • translateRangeAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateRangeAxioms()
        Translate range OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?x, ?y) -> R(?y)
        (where R is the range of p)

      • translateSomeValuesFromAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateSomeValuesFromAxioms()
        Translate some values from OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?x, ?y) /\ A(?y) -> (p someValuesFrom A)(?x)

      • translateSubclassAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateSubclassAxioms()
        Translate subclass OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        SubClass(?x) -> SuperClass(?x)

      • translateSubpropertyAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateSubpropertyAxioms()
        Translate subproperty OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule.

        sub_prop(?x, ?y) -> super_prop(?x, ?y)

      • translateSymmetricPropertyAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateSymmetricPropertyAxioms()
        Translate symmetric property OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?x, ?y) -> p(?y, ?x)

      • translateThingAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateThingAxioms()
        Translate thing OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        C1(?x) -> Thing(?x)
        C2(?x) -> Thing(?x)
        ...
        (where C1, C2, ... are owl classes that are not subclasses of any other classes (besides Thing)).

      • translateTransitivePropertyAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateTransitivePropertyAxioms()
        Translate transitive property OWL axioms into the following SWRL rule

        p(?a, ?b) /\ p(?b, ?c) -> p(?a, ?c)

      • translateUnionAxioms

        public abstract boolean translateUnionAxioms()
        Translate union OWL axioms into the following SWRL rules

        A(?x) -> C(?x)
        B(?x) -> C(?x)
        (where C = unionOf({A, B}))

      • useWax

        public boolean useWax()
